From: 
Sent: Tuesday, March 31, 2020 10:03 AM 
To: Gloria Allred 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Call this week 
Gloria, 
We were wondering if you or your colleagues have been able to reach any of the clients we discussed last week? It would 
be very helpful to know their views and reactions shortly —  and we're of course happy to speak with them directly as well 
if that would be helpful. 
thanks,

From: 
Sent: Wednesday, March 25, 2020 1:55 PM 
To: Gloria 
Allred < 
Cc: 
< 
Subject: Call this week 
Gloria, 
Would you have time for a call with the SONY Epstein team tomorrow or Friday? We would like to provide you with a 
bit of an update and discuss some of your clients in particular. 
Hope you are staying safe and healthy. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007
